TEXT.English: Fresh groceries and fruits delivered from all over the world directly to your home cities.
TEXT.French: Produits d'épicerie et fruits provenant du monde entier directement dans vos Villes.
TEXT.German: Fresh groceries and fruits delivered from all over the world directly to your home cities.
TEXT.Italian: Fresh groceries and fruits delivered from all over the world directly to your home cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Fresh groceries and fruits delivered from all over the world directly to your home cities.

TEXT.English: Fresh groceries and fruits delivered from all over the world directly to your local store.
TEXT.French: Produits d'épicerie et fruits provenant du monde entier directement dans votre Epicerie
TEXT.German: Fresh groceries and fruits delivered from all over the world directly to your local store.
TEXT.Italian: Fresh groceries and fruits delivered from all over the world directly to your local store.
TEXT.Spanish: Fresh groceries and fruits delivered from all over the world directly to your local store.

TEXT.English: Build this corporation in order to get fruit and groceries bonuses.
TEXT.French: Construire cette corporation pour obtenir la ressource 'fruits et épices'.
